mapper.select: select * from (select rownum n, a.* from (select * from customer order by custid) a) where n between #{startRecord} and #{endRecord}

select count(*) from customer
where (custid like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
select custid from customer where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update customer set pwd=#{pwd} where custid=#{custid} and phone=#{phone}
